text: Hi all, I have created a dockerized environment for the v0.6 HFC unit tests which ideally I'd like to contribute to the official v0.6 branch of fabric -- is this branch still open for changes not introducing new features?  In particular, this would present a complete example of how to spin up the necessary services and run a real web app using HFC and HL with a single docker-compose command, and because it was so difficult for me to get to that point, I'd like to contribute this so others have an easier time at it.  <@U13TWBRBL> ?

<@U2X9KDDL7> I think it’ll take some coordination to open v0.6 back up, and most if not all contributors are focused on v1.0, would it be possible for this to be published as a blog? I think <@U0J038AJK> should be able to help with that
